generalMeaning: Something small and round which is typically found at the end of something thin and long, such as a berry on the end of a twig, or any thing or any action directly or indirectly associated with this.
nominalLexeme: 1. A kind of small, round fruit that grows on a bush or tree, some of which you can eat. English = berry.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: a small sphere at the end of a stem.
